title: Workshop on Blended Learning-Based Language Education Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary curriculum design and basic understanding of language teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: A program focusing on pre-service and in-service teachers analyzing blended learning effectiveness in language education and developing strategies for classroom application. PBL tasks combining smartphone-based digital resources with offline activities

learning_goals: It can present three or more clear objectives and expectations for language education in a blended learning environment.
It can improve digital/offline materials for language education by applying learning material quality evaluation criteria.
It can design collaborative learning activities to enhance language proficiency and increase learning engagement by 20% or more.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
